body_html: I'm just beginning to learn about MPS now. One thing I noticed in your above code is that you're running the same job twice concurrently with '&', but not limiting the space that each job can take on the GPU, as referenced here: https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/using_gpu#allowing_gpu_memory_growth (maybe try 0.45 for each session if you're running two?). I'll be looking into this sort of use case as I learn more about MPS. :)
